verses.name: Job 38:1
verses.text: Respondens autem Dominus Job de turbine, dixit :

verses.name: Job 38:2
verses.text: Quis est iste involvens sententias  sermonibus imperitis ?

verses.name: Job 38:3
verses.text: Accinge sicut vir lumbos tuos :  interrogabo te, et responde mihi.

verses.name: Job 38:4
verses.text: Ubi eras quando ponebam fundamenta terræ ?  indica mihi, si habes intelligentiam.

verses.name: Job 38:5
verses.text: Quis posuit mensuras ejus, si nosti ?  vel quis tetendit super eam lineam ?

verses.name: Job 38:6
verses.text: Super quo bases illius solidatæ sunt ?  aut quis demisit lapidem angularem ejus,

verses.name: Job 38:7
verses.text: cum me laudarent simul astra matutina,  et jubilarent omnes filii Dei ?

verses.name: Job 38:8
verses.text: Quis conclusit ostiis mare,  quando erumpebat quasi de vulva procedens ;

verses.name: Job 38:9
verses.text: cum ponerem nubem vestimentum ejus,  et caligine illud quasi pannis infantiæ obvolverem ?

verses.name: Job 38:10
verses.text: Circumdedi illud terminis meis,  et posui vectem et ostia,

verses.name: Job 38:11
verses.text: et dixi : Usque huc venies, et non procedes amplius,  et hic confringes tumentes fluctus tuos.

verses.name: Job 38:12
verses.text: Numquid post ortum tuum præcepisti diluculo,  et ostendisti auroræ locum suum ?

verses.name: Job 38:13
verses.text: Et tenuisti concutiens extrema terræ,  et excussisti impios ex ea ?

verses.name: Job 38:14
verses.text: Restituetur ut lutum signaculum,  et stabit sicut vestimentum :

verses.name: Job 38:15
verses.text: auferetur ab impiis lux sua,  et brachium excelsum confringetur.

verses.name: Job 38:16
verses.text: Numquid ingressus es profunda maris,  et in novissimis abyssi deambulasti ?

verses.name: Job 38:17
verses.text: Numquid apertæ sunt tibi portæ mortis,  et ostia tenebrosa vidisti ?

verses.name: Job 38:18
verses.text: Numquid considerasti latitudinem terræ ?  indica mihi, si nosti, omnia :

verses.name: Job 38:19
verses.text: in qua via lux habitet,  et tenebrarum quis locus sit :

verses.name: Job 38:20
verses.text: ut ducas unumquodque ad terminos suos,  et intelligas semitas domus ejus.

verses.name: Job 38:21
verses.text: Sciebas tunc quod nasciturus esses,  et numerum dierum tuorum noveras ?

verses.name: Job 38:22
verses.text: Numquid ingressus es thesauros nivis,  aut thesauros grandinis aspexisti,

verses.name: Job 38:23
verses.text: quæ præparavi in tempus hostis,  in diem pugnæ et belli ?

verses.name: Job 38:24
verses.text: Per quam viam spargitur lux,  dividitur æstus super terram ?

verses.name: Job 38:25
verses.text: Quis dedit vehementissimo imbri cursum,  et viam sonantis tonitrui,

verses.name: Job 38:26
verses.text: ut plueret super terram absque homine in deserto,  ubi nullus mortalium commoratur ;

verses.name: Job 38:27
verses.text: ut impleret inviam et desolatam,  et produceret herbas virentes ?

verses.name: Job 38:28
verses.text: Quis est pluviæ pater ?  vel quis genuit stillas roris ?

verses.name: Job 38:29
verses.text: De cujus utero egressa est glacies ?  et gelu de cælo quis genuit ?

verses.name: Job 38:30
verses.text: In similitudinem lapidis aquæ durantur,  et superficies abyssi constringitur.

verses.name: Job 38:31
verses.text: Numquid conjungere valebis micantes stellas Pleiadas,  aut gyrum Arcturi poteris dissipare ?

verses.name: Job 38:32
verses.text: Numquid producis luciferum in tempore suo,  et vesperum super filios terræ consurgere facis ?

verses.name: Job 38:33
verses.text: Numquid nosti ordinem cæli,  et pones rationem ejus in terra ?

verses.name: Job 38:34
verses.text: Numquid elevabis in nebula vocem tuam,  et impetus aquarum operiet te ?

verses.name: Job 38:35
verses.text: Numquid mittes fulgura, et ibunt,  et revertentia dicent tibi : Adsumus ?

verses.name: Job 38:36
verses.text: Quis posuit in visceribus hominis sapientiam ?  vel quis dedit gallo intelligentiam ?

verses.name: Job 38:37
verses.text: Quis enarrabit cælorum rationem ?  et concentum cæli quis dormire faciet ?

verses.name: Job 38:38
verses.text: Quando fundebatur pulvis in terra,  et glebæ compingebantur ?

verses.name: Job 38:39
verses.text: Numquid capies leænæ prædam,  et animam catulorum ejus implebis,

verses.name: Job 38:40
verses.text: quando cubant in antris,  et in specubus insidiantur ?

verses.name: Job 38:41
verses.text: Quis præparat corvo escam suam,  quando pulli ejus clamant ad Deum,  vagantes, eo quod non habeant cibos ?
